original_title: President talks as if he has gone insane: Sajith
original_body_lines: Responding to the remark made by President Ranil Wickremesinghe that the local government election has not been legally declared, Leader Of Opposition Sajith Premadasa today questioned as to why the UNP had submitted nominations if there were no polls.

"We question why the party which is led by the President has submitted nominations if the polls are not declared legally. It is clear that President Wickremesinghe is the master brain behind the postponement of the local government election. President talks as if he has gone insane, “Premadasa said.
"There is a conspiracy to roll the electoral map and bring about a Hitler-type dictatorship. We will launch a revolution to prevent this move, “he added. (Yohan Perera)
